episodes_names: Episode 1 - This Self-Proclaimed Goddess and Reincarnation in Another World!
Episode 2 - An Explosion for This Chunibyo!
Episode 3 - A Panty Treasure in This Right Hand!
Episode 4 - Explosion Magic for This Formidable Enemy!
Episode 5 - A Price for This Cursed Sword!
Episode 6 - A Conclusion to This Worthless Fight!
Episode 7 - A Second Death in This Freezing Season!
Episode 8 - A Loving Hand for Our Party When We Can't Make It Through Winter!
Episode 9 - God's Blessing on This Wonderful Shop!
Episode 10 - Final Flame for this Over-the-top Fortress!
